extendedInfo.description: Master the punctuation rules and write with greater confidence. Over 300 examples and seventy-four mini-lessons with exercises. Carry with you a reference for everyday questions.Can you tell when a colon, a comma or semicolon is required? Do you capitalize the first word after a colon? Do you include a point or full stop inside or outside quotations marks? Do you known the difference between a hyphen and a dash? Do you know how to punctuate URLs and email addresses? The main benefits of the application are the following: â¢ Over seventy-four mini-lessons, with each one covering a concept. â¢ Flip the lesson to reveal an exercise to reinforce the concept. â¢ Differences between American and British punctuation. â¢ Keep it as a quick reference for everyday questions. â¢ Improve your writing. â¢ Brush up your punctuation skills. ContentsApostrophesCapitalization and namesSemicolonColonCommaHyphensDashes ParenthesesBracketsPeriod or full stopEllipsesQuestion marksExclamationQuotation marks

reviews.title: Punctuation Made Simple with Comprehensive Example
reviews.comment: Just installed it and overview some lessons. Language is very simple and easy to understand. 2 colors are used for examples, Green for correct sentence and Red for Wrong use of the Punctuation. So far I didn\'t find any fluff and unwanted adds. Personally I would recommend it to all those who are interested in learning Punctuation and Want their writings more professional.
reviews.author: Babar Saeed
